title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, I noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe the behavior of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
